title: Strawberry Delight
description: When Life Gives You Strawberries …… Let Gabe give you orgasms.This short story (6K) was written because 15 January was National Strawberry Ice Cream Day – and I couldn’t let that go without any recognition.Strawberry Delight is set after the final chapter of Tattooed Memories but before the epilogue. You MUST read Tattooed Memories prior, as this short does contain spoilers.
author: L. Ann
